website_summaries.verdict: A good camera for novices or occasional photographers who want a mid-level action camera at a middle-of-the-road price.
pros: Offers decent 4K resolution for a mid-range price
Easy to shoot from numerous angles
Has other features of pricier models, such as built-in WiFi and lots of accessories to get your started
cons: While picture quality is good, it's not quite comparable to that of GoPro models

customer_reviews.title: 4k Action camera to buy at one fourth the price of gopro
customer_reviews.text: Just came from a 3 day camping trip and used this camera for my youtube channel (PNYprepper).Surprised with the quality of the camera and the quality of the image.No problem with 4K 30 fps setting.The watch is a good addition when attached to a gimbal in my drone.By the way even at 1080p at 60 fps video quality is great too.
customer_reviews.author: PNYprepper

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - and sometimes less
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the Akaso but unfortunately, after owning it for a few weeks I was very disappointed with the camera. To start off with, the camera itself is very buggy. I've had many video files refuse to save, numerous random crashes during recording without saving the file, and has absolutely terrible battery life. Time lapse shooting is of poor quality (screen won't shut off) and the wifi connectivity is useless. The second time I attempted to close the case the plastic latch broke before it was even tightened. I hope akaso can improve on this because they have lots of potential but at this stage of the game all i can say is that it's a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Captain V

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great videos and is very smooth with the EIS on. Color is nice and bright but not overexposed. Takes sharp pictures too. Camera is also heavier than others, feels really well built. Touch screen is very responsive and bright, back glass seems very thick. I have a few of these action cameras and I recommend this one over all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Mardis

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: The camera didn't work so, I returned it. First of all, not sure how truthful some of these reviews are since the seller offers an extension gift if you review their product. The gift includes a mini sd card which is needed to operate the camera. I ended up buying a $30 card and $30 batteries for the remote, which also didn't work. If you do buy this camera, and you have trouble releasing the camera from the mount - squeeze the sides together. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: geraly

customer_reviews.title: By a Gopro or a Yi
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't connect to wifi...guess i have to return it...what an inconvenience 2 days later...now it doesn't turn on. A week later they sent me a new one but the new one doesn't work either it stopped working on my vacation and since I got home I discovered I can't return it now because it's been 30 days. It didn't record my first day and a half of vacation luckily once I discovered it I had a back-up camera which was a Yi
customer_reviews.author: snl fan

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It comes with 2 batteries, a charger for both batteries and ridiculous amount of accessories! They will also send 2 more batteries or 32 gb microsd card on top of all the accessories. The build looks high quality as well. Can't wait to test drive this camera! UPDATE: After testing out the camera and comparing it with the GoPro Hero 4, the GoPro Hero 4 has much better clarity, wider camera angle and better color. I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a GoPro instead
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed in this camera. Took it snorkeling today and the image quality is terrible. The attaché photo was taken at a 14 mega pixel resolution. The video quality taken in 1080 p at 60 frames looks only a little better than scrambled cable. Very disappointing. Battery only lasted for 2 hours. Not worth the time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with/for my 10 year old daughter. We unboxed it last night and got it up and running. Within an hour the camera froze. I was able to take the battery out and get it working again. Today, after I took my daughter to school I turned it on to get more familiar with the product and it is frozen in the splash screen. Took battery out and tried another battery... same thing. Frozen on the splash screen. Looks like we got a lemon and I am bummed to tell my kid... lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: TomSawyer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use right away Compact design (about 2 inches by 3 inches) Remote control simplicity Image/video stabilization Versatile mounting system- works with most action camera mounts Super fast start up time when powering on/off Cons: Sound quality isn’t the best, but it’s not terrible. I suggest investing in a plug in microphone
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the money. The recommended app is simple and intuitive to use, although I imagine I will use it more to set date/time than control. It is useful for camera orientation due to the on screen display, but I find the remote and top mounted buttons to be easier especially if you are operating a vehicle. I mounted this camera to my mirror on my motorcycle and took a 10 minute video. The video clarity and sound were very impressive! The attached video portion was taken with the camera inside the case. All in all, I am very impressed with this product and will not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value and features.  More to follow.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this camera system. My only disappointment is that it won’t film upside down... Maybe I can hope for an update to the firmware as this will allow me to mount my camera underneath my rifle... The stabilization feature seems a o be amazing! I also appreciate the different fields of you that are available... Two more comments: 1) I could not get the WiFi connent to my IPhone to work. Amazon Tried to connect to the manufacturer but couldn’t get through so they sent me another camera. 2) The accessories are interesting but confusing to a new action camera owner. No explanation included. The two obvious items missing: a ball cap clip and a headband with attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing image quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera almost exclusively for recording my son’s youth hockey games. Typically, the lighting is not great so I need a camera with good low light features. I always shoot 1080 60fps. I’m disappointed in the quality of the movies. The movies come out grainy and unsharp, almost like a high digital zoom. It’s not good. On the positive side, the battery life is excellent, lasting well over 90 minutes at the 1080 60fps. I have not shot in 4K, but I can’t imagine the quality would be better.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Larkin

customer_reviews.title: All kind of problems ! SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! Don't fall for cheap price! I had Akaso V50 pro and after only few videos it stops working. Yes, they had a good costomer service , they replaced the camera , but the new one also had a problems . You never know are you going to make the video clip or not. Yesterday I did at least 10 video clips attempts on my training session on the woods ... I have no one video only losing my time for attempts to make videos. My memory card is perfect everything looks fine...start push button for video it shows it works ....and at the end ... nothing..😜🤔
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: External mic doesn't work with this.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes great video. Audio quality is pretty trash. Also be warned: there's a bit of false advertising. It claims it supports an external mic. It didn't work with my mic. Upon further research it appears that it only works with the official akaso mic. That's $10 but it's mono sound. Which means it relies on the internal mic for stereo. I returned mine and will get the GoPro Hero (2018) which can be firmware updated to be a GoPro Hero 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod Johnson

customer_reviews.title: good product. Some flaws to improve on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but can fall short in key areas like battery life and fps. For the price it is a good competitor to the go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Fool me once, shame on you...  Fool me twice...
customer_reviews.text: After I returned the camera I purchased for a full refund because it didn't work AT ALL, the company sent me a replacement free of charge. I am a professional scuba diver and used the camera for 3 days diving and never took it below 45 feet. The housing leaked, which made the lens fog due to heat generated by the battery, and the red-filter intended for underwater use is sub-par at best. Do yourself a favor and spend the money on a REAL GoPro and buy the red filter add-on - this camera is a 2-time loser.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic video quality and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence between a Hero or this unit. After seeing many side by side comparisons I'm happy we decided on this Akaso camera. The video and audio is on par with the GoPro's at 1/3 the cost. Hopefully the attached video quality isn't reduced too much by uploading to Amazon. We only record a couple of minutes at a time racing, but, a single battery charge lasts over 2 weekends of running. The only complaint i have about this camera is how easily the rear viewscreen and front lens can be scratched just cleaning them occasionally with good microfiber towels. We may purchase an additional camera to mount facing backwards now!
customer_reviews.author: DJordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how many accessories are included with the camera. I find the image and video quality to be 100% better than the Yi Lite I had previously purchased and returned. It uses a high quality Panasonic sensor and processor, which explains the image and video quality. Packaging is comparable what you get with Go Pro, which is unusual at this price point. I am satisfied so far and highly recommended this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chottobaka

customer_reviews.title: Free stuff for reviews!!!! Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start off with the note about leaving reviews for free stuff. Yeah I assume that’s why it has so many good reviews but they don’t want you mentioning that. The camera is of poor quality, everything came nicely packed but that’s about it for the good. The video quality in 4K didn’t look like any 4K I have ever shot with more expensive cameras. Even though it’s not meant for picture I tried that and they came out horrible. The sd card barely sat flush with side of the camera. I’m assuming it’s about on quality with the much cheaper $50-75 camera which might make it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Cam
customer_reviews.text: We have used this camera on 2 vacations now and would highly recommend. Used for lots of snorkeling, kayaking, paddleboarding, & zip lining. It has been great for all applications. Underwater quality was way better than expected and image stabilization during zip lining worked perfectly. In my opinion, this cam is just as good as a GoPro but for way less money. Definitely worth the buy, and if I ever mess this one up I will purchase another AKASO cam. Amazon “compressed” the video and pics I tried to share so the quality might not be the same on here as it is in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lpen

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera, gets better with practice
customer_reviews.text: The pictures from this camera are great. The movies are also sharp and clear. Camera setting make big difference in picture quality. Love the camera size. I took it to a SF 49ers came and used it instead of phone shots. Both the photos and video were surperior. I mounted it on the Chest strap and took it to a Dog Scent Class where my dog works on a leash in front of me. Makes an excellant training tool. Very happy with the camera and the pictures it takes are improving with with practice with the camera. Like it and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed. Just get a GoPro. False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this budget cam. Even with a $10 off coupon, was extremely disappointed. Bought it for the weekend(June 7-8-9 ) to record my daughter's games and couldn't get it to function . Tried it on 3 different devices and would not connect to the Wi-Fi. Then was reading that this cam does not live stream ( false advertising).Should've just spent the money and got a gopro. There is no number to call for any tech support. Tried calling Amazon's tech support which was no help either. You get what you pay for and I'm returning this very angry. It was delivered and tried all weekend to make it work. This really ruins a lot for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PISSED! IT BROKE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third AKASO product that I have purchased and none have worked properly. I will not go into all the details but the case on this one broke while simply closing it. The clasp is only 0.097" thick (I measured it). Needless to say, the case is necessary to make this camera fully usable. Before anyone says that I was too rough, I an 70 years old. For me, rough is a Child Proof cap.
customer_reviews.author: John McHan

customer_reviews.title: Good action camera for price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap lite camera, not necessarily an 'action' camera. I tested on a tripod with indoor lighting. Video quality is better than the Akaso EK7000 Pro but not as good as my phone camera. Audio was extremely low. If the video quality were better I might have tried the external mic. Instead I decide an action camera won't work for me. The remote did not work, not sure if it needed a battery but didn't bother once I decided it wasn't for me. Good customer service followup wanting to know how they can help. If you understand action cameras are different, this is definitely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most important feature of action cameras is the waterproof housing. The camera is ok but the waterproof housing clamp has a high failure rate. So much so that AKASO stop making the replacement waterproof housing. I'm a spearfishing enthusiast and with no replacement housing, this camera is useless... It appears that all AKASO action cameras have the same problem of cheap plastic waterproof housing that breaks... Do your research. My father taught me that the cheap way out always ends up costing more money... Just save your money and get the GoPro Hero 7 that does NOT require waterproof housing. The realistic threshold for a quality waterproof action camera is $200+ USD
customer_reviews.author: breakaway civilization

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this action camera and the respective product memory card and outdoor accessory kit. The video quality is very good and the optional view angle has four selections. It also has WiFi and HDMI output capability. The touch screen is convenient and can be used for framing shots or playback. The camera is quite small and easily fits in the palm of your hand. The gyroscope works well and the camera has ports for a micro SD card, mini USB and mini HDMI. Very easy to use even when the waterproof case is deployed. Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great value camera with stable picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with quality and price of this camera. I've been hunting for a good video camera for my Colorado trip with family. First thing that came to my mind was GoPro, come to find out it was too expensive. After some research, came to conclusion that I wanted to try Akaso. V50 pro seemed to be a good price range and 4k camera with advanced stabilizer. Bought this here and it came a day before my trip. Glad I bought this and highly recommend for GoPro alternative. One thing to note is that sound is harsh during high winds, other than that no issues. All the pictures and video unedited.
customer_reviews.author: Timurid

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the camera for an upcoming Panama Cruise, partly to time lapse the transit, and partly to use while snorkeling and swimming with manta rays, etc. The trip won't be for a while, but everything I've done so far has been exactly as advertised. I've experimented with the various mounts, adding two flexible tripods, a magnetic mount, and a "jaws" clamp to my toolkit. The camera was so reasonably priced I don't feel these minimal expenditures were excessive. I very much look forward to many years of filming family trips and the grandkids as they grow. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cgcis

customer_reviews.title: Bought this camera due to great reviews. Took it on our Caribbean trip for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera due to great reviews. Took it on our Caribbean trip for underwater photos. Kept the camera is a cool dry place as recommended, but after an hour of batteries being off the charger both were dead every time. Not one picture taken the whole vacation!!! Returned immediately!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Winters

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons graduation and saw the reviews were pretty good. Received the box and was pleasantly surprised with the 2nd battery and an wrist remote along with a seemingly endless supply of attachments not to mention the waterproof case. The picture quality is ok, not GoPro and got a little upset with the image stabilization but then realized it ships with stabilization off. Battery life is good but have yet to max it out recording in 4K.
customer_reviews.author: M. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Every Detail!
customer_reviews.text: The Akaso V50 Pro, with gyroscope and image stabilization, delivers picture-perfect image quality and impeccable sound. After the V50 Pro's close cousin the V50X seamlessly recorded high-speed motorcycle runs under 4K/30 fps, the V50 Pro had much to live up to. Where the V50X lacked in sound quality, the V50 Pro excelled. Though the V50X was not a blunt instrument, the V50 Pro was surgical. The V50 Pro did not clumsily muffle speech, and captured sound in almost microscopic details. Although the V50X's image stabilization fared slightly better, overall the best Akaso camera, and the best for its price, is the V50 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Touch Screen Magic
customer_reviews.text: I had the AKASO V50 last year, until a diving mishap. I was happy with the camera and decided to replace it with the AKASO V50 Pro. Set up of the camera, sync with my computer and iPhone through the app was easy. The selling point for me on this camera was the touch screen and ease of moving through the settings. The only negative comment I can state at this time is my personal dislike for the watch type remote. I found the key fob type of remote with the previous model more practical, and unfortunately, it does not link to the new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cpallen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company and more than stellar customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Akaso worked closely with me to rectify my issue with the V50 Pro and updated the camera firmware. The camera should be on par with the original V50. Can't stress enough on how fast and courteous Akaso's customer service department is (specially Sunny, they worked fast to issue me a replacement to resolve my issues with the original camera) The camera's build quality is solid with a rubbery texture for the camera housing which I like, much like the new GoPro. The accessories are great to mount the camera to anything you can think of. Also the included 2 batteries are a great addition. Videos and photos are are decent for the price and great competition among others.
customer_reviews.author: Morsy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I went with this inexpensive device because I think the current popular competitive device (GP) is too expensive. But, with this device, you get what you pay for. I can say that so far it works. I have gotten some very good videos. But I am not impressed. My number one complaint is it constantly loses time and date. The navigation of the settings screens are cumbersome. The battery lasts about 1 hour and 15 minutes on 1080p. Luckily it comes with two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Shipp

customer_reviews.title: Second time's a charm.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good camera with good stabilization and video quality. The audio was pretty good and did a very good job filtering out the wind. However, I had to return it because it would not connect to our phones or laptop through wifi. I'll probably order another one to see if it was a glitch with that particular camera. Update: The company contacted me and they are sending a new camera to replace the defective unit. The wifi works in the replacement camera. Now I'm looking for an external microphone to do a blogging style setup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Akaso steps up
customer_reviews.text: Item wouldn't accept sd cards of any type I had. They were the correct type as stated in manual . Returned item to manufacturer and never heard from again UPDATE The company had contacted me , not only did I exchange the non working camera for a replacement but they also refunded me a portion of the purchase. So far around the house the camera is working as advertised and seems like a great value. Will have to try some action type stuff soon for the real test but I have to give the company 5 stars for making it right and
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: I trust my 20 year anniversary trip to it
customer_reviews.text: I've played with this for a while, and I've decided I can trust my 20 year anniversary trip to Alaska with this camera. It takes great pics and videos, and it's easy to switch between camera and video. I already had some accessories like head harness, chest harness, selfie stick, etc., and this camera will attach those just like my old camera (which was a different brand). The app is a little slow, but once it connects to your camera, you can see real-time streaming of the camera on your phone, plus browse pics and videos you've taken. This is pretty cool since it means you don't have to have a computer to transfer pics and videos off the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sugg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA, GREAT PRICE, WONDERFUL GIFT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a gift for my 13 yr. old grandson. He had expressed an interest in a Go Pro. The V50 pro was rated so high and the cost was considerably less so I chose the V50 Pro. He loves everything about it. He wanted it for a cruise he was going on with his family but that was cancelled because of the virus. This gave him lots of extra time to learn more about his camera. He was so excited with everything it did and said it was the best gift he had ever received and I think it's the best gift I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: V50 Pro Waterproof case and the latching mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the V50 Pro Camera after reading multiple excellent reviews. What I missed was that the waterproof case had presented issues for some customers. After 3 months of using my case, the latch on the case broke and my comments on the latch were heard quickly by Akaso's customer service; next, I received an email letting me know that I will be receiving a replacement waterproof case. The camera is performing well and I haven't had any issues with it. I do appreciate the due diligence from Akaso's customer service with my issue and grateful with the resolution. Great job Akaso.
customer_reviews.author: hcarvajal

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for action cam!
customer_reviews.text: I am going on a cruize in a couple of weeks. I didn't have an action cam and was looking for a GoPro alternative so I wouldn't break the bank. I ran across the Akaso cams and liked what I saw. I purchased the V50 Pro and have used it for about a week. The features are great and easy to use. Touchscreen is definitely a plus. The accessories delivered with the cam were right on with several different mounts AND a waterproof case AND 2 batteries with charger. The video is great. I am looking forward to some great scuba shots and bikinis by the pool without the large price of the name brand cam. Rock On AKASO!!
customer_reviews.author: LBHunter3

customer_reviews.title: Had to return 2 defective. Looking for something else
customer_reviews.text: Had to return two different cameras because of extremely bad image quality and then would not turn on after a day of testing use. Image quality is passable but only in 4k. No other resolution options are usable for anything. Dark areas of the image are completely gone. This is not worth the price or the hassle even though the price and features seem great. I had high hopes but was completely disappointed. I'll be looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: GP quality and service without the price!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good reviews but some very screwy firmware. Contacted company and honestly not much help. The video quality is no where near stated when compared to a GP. Disappointed. GP is made in China as well but with more stringent quality standards. Update 5/2020. The manufacturer reached out and quickly resolved the issue and I am able to get as good or better video and pics without the previous issues. Any manufacturer that reads reviews and responds this quickly get 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: MAGA

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be as good as gopro...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gopro 7 black. That thing was a piece of crap! I don't get what the hype is about. This akaso seems to be just as good for a lot less. And I wont have a meltdown if I happen to lose it. Going to get an external mic for it, I will be using it for YouTube vids. Also love that i got accessories that came with it and a cool remote wrist watch. No complaints!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin johnson

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Not too much into sports, but wanted a little camera that was handy to carry in my pocket. By putting it in the waterproof case I don't have to worry about scratching the lens or viewing screen. Definitely high enough quality images for my purpose. The remote control ceased to work almost immediately, but they are sending a partial refund. I doubt I would use the remote much anyway, though it might be useful for selfies. Considering the difference in price from a GoPro, I am more than happy. UPDATE: The latch on the waterproof case broke. I contacted customer service and they replaced it quickly and efficiently. Great people!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable video camera!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research and comparisons between different cameras I ordered the Akaso V50 Pro Native waterproof camera, which is about 1/4th of the price of a GoPro, and after trying it out on several snorkeling trips, I couldn't be happier. I mainly filmed in semi-clear water in Southern California and wasn't expecting stellar results, but what I filmed looked pretty much exactly how it looked in person so I'm pleased as punch. I love this little camera!
customer_reviews.author: dantealis

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof case broke... Updated, see below.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera, so I can not compare it to well known brands like GoPro. I like it, but the protective case developed a split in the latch area: poor design as other reviewers pointing out. The worst thing is that I can not buy a replacement, as the case is unique for V50 pro and not available anywhere. UPDATE: The replacement just arrived - the whole package, wow! Can not imagine a better service! The part of the housing that broke looks beefier in new package. It will have most use during summer, will see how well the housing will hold. To be updated then.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rabinovich

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say I love this camera! The video is awesome. It really is a great camera for the money. I looked at buying a gopro, but I couldn't justify spending double for a camera that might be a little better. I love the app that you can download. You can see what is the camera is recording which is a big help, you can control the camera settings and much more with this app. It works great for me. The only negative thing I can say so far is the if the camera is In the waterproof case the sound quality is pretty bad. Other then that it's been a great camera! I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cdl101

customer_reviews.title: Well built action camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is well built. I am giving 4 stars only for the application default language is Chinese. I had to get a friend of mine to translate.so if you need to change the language, go to settings, and scroll down till the 6 line from top. There you can change the language. Lets get back to the camera. It has a decent performance. I tried it for almost half an hour, indoor and outdoor. Its overall performance is good, just struggling little bit indoor and in low light condition l, which is normal to all action cameras. But always remember you're paying 119 dollars for that. So overall it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: IMAD ABOUGHANNAM

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this action camera for my 9 year old son and it's been great. Very tough construction and he was able to figure out the controls very quickly. He spent the winter filming his downhill skiing sessions and more recently has been using it to film some interesting mountain hikes and runs. Great option for kids when you don't want to spend a ton of money on something that will likely get destroyed or lost, but still offers the quality and look of a Go Pro. We haven't had any problems with it and the battery still lasts plenty long. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Dougfir

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, even better price!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just what we wanted. It has great picture quality, stability and is super user friendly. It comes with 2 batteries that charge very quickly and a bunch of attachment options allowing you to use it basically anywhere for any thing! The waterproof case is great for our trips to the water park going down the slides. All the functions of the big name brand for half the price!. I love this camera. Even my 8 year old is in love with it. He attaches it to his bike when he rides and my husband wants to buy another for his competitions.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was a little cumbersome. Camera had come free of mounting so was concerned about damage, but it was fine. I would have preferred a full paper manual. The only full manual had to be downloaded. Interface was simple and straightforward. Batteries charged very quickly and so far hold a charge with lots of usage. Video is crisp, if a bit over-sharp but very usable. Image stab is very good, but draws battery fairly hard. Leave it off unless shooting action. For the 99% of people that don't need GoPro professional quality, this camera is a great buy for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terri N

customer_reviews.title: Stabalization did not function.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this was going to be the steal of the century. The image stabalization did not work, even after confirming latest firmware and gyro calibration was installed. The app crashed all the time and even with my mobile data off and trying it in airplane mode as well, the wifi would not stay connected. Picture quality is great however so thats a plus. I was going to motovlog with this camera so no stabalization is an automatic fail.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Endriss

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera, excellent build quality and picture, robust accessories package, budget price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture clarity and full array of features in a well made camera that's a fraction of other "name brand" action cameras. I'm extremely impressed at the image quality on 4K, the ability to do slow motion and time lapse, and the plethora of accessories and mounting options that come with this camera. Image stabilization is very good (4 star) and just short of the most expensive cameras on the market. In short, this is a rock-solid camera with excellent picture quality and a substantial option package, all at a budget price.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderlizard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quality camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Camera and used it in the snowy mountains for snowboarding and deep in the ocean in costa maya. This camera held up really well. In the water it gets pretty good detail and is really light to carry around. You can also easily press the record button while in the water. The camera is easy to use, it only has two buttons so it’s easily figured out. While this action camera is on a helmet I could barely feel that it was there. This action camera captured a lot of what I did so I would say it is one of the best cameras out there.
customer_reviews.author: TraitorJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the more expensive motion video cameras
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exclusively on my motorcycle to capture video for the past six months. The quality of the video is great. The ability to record short clips is very convenient. The unit has held out very well for the past six months and the video and audio quality is excellent. My only con is the fact that if the battery dies, the clock resets and you have to remember to reset the clock otherwise your videos will all have the wrong time/date on them.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaCritic

customer_reviews.title: great pic and video
customer_reviews.text: wanted a good sports camera, the Akaso v50 pro is Great for the price. It comes with lots of attachments and all the tools it needs. It comes will 2 batteries and a dual battery charger. has great pics. and videos. it feels good in your hand, feels like it is made well. with the case on you really can't hear sound but its a waterproof case. here is a portion of the 1st drive just to try the video I put on my dash. have not tried all the settings yet but this is a great sports camera for the price. going everywhere with. Just needs A case it doesn't come with a case
customer_reviews.author: skybox richard / david leon

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade an older Go Pro and didn't want to invest the dollars in the latest Go Pro. We took it with us on a cruise to the Dutch Antilles with lots of snorkeling and several dives. It worked flawlessly. The red underwater filter works really nicely. Pictures were clean and video was great. Took it to 75ft without any issues. Image stabilization worked great. Would recommend. Nice product especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent action camera!
customer_reviews.text: I barrel race so I've been looking around for a good action camera that I could use to record my runs and anytime I ride. After a lot of research this was the camera I decided to try over a GoPro and I'm glad I did. The video quality is great, the battery lasts a good few hours between charges and all the accessories that it comes with are a plus! It's also very easy to use. I'm very glad I purchased this and was able to save myself money without compromising quality. I've had mine for a few months and it's still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: BMMPuro1022

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a short time but was quickly replaced by Akaso
customer_reviews.text: Camera froze (and would not unfreeze) after a few shots. Taking battery out did not unfreeze it. But the Akaso help line replaced the original camera with a new camera in a timely manner. They included a set of additional attachments as a way of saying they were sorry for our temporary problem. The additional attachment set includes a floating handle which should make the entire camera and housing neutral buoyant for diving - an excellent addition. The camera, the attachments, and the packaging are of a very high quality. But I was most impressed with the responsiveness and helpfulness of the Akaso staff.
customer_reviews.author: Dellywhere

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take on vacation since I knew I was going to be spending a lot of time in the water. I tested it out in a pool before I left and the quality was great, but I really wanted to see how it would work in the ocean. Got back from vacation and this camera is Amazing! Picture quality is great and loved the pictures that came out while I was in the ocean. Very clear! For the price and quality, I am happy! I look forward to continue using this camera and capturing my aqua experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Lola06

customer_reviews.title: Set it up and stop playing with it, just use it and have fun making great memories.
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, once you set it up you simply got 2 buttons to push. Not crazy about the WiFi . Shoot what you want and take it to the computer for viewing and editing. It comes with all the accessories for riding a motorcycle and even a quick tripod mount. The remote worked for a minute then died. Akaso didn’t replace it, that’s why 4 Stars not 5. Can’t compare to a GoPro just too much price difference and money talks, but this camera does what I need done with complete satisfaction. Used for 3 weeks and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Good cam, some features lack but still good
customer_reviews.text: Well, its good camera for its money, keep in mind that: 1. RF setting being reset after being turned off (need to take off camera, goto option and set RF ON to able to remotely control it) 2. Time and date reset when you change battery, in fact all settings are reset when you pull out battery. Don't forget to check settings when switching battery Although when I communicated support - service was great, kindly helped me!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Z.

customer_reviews.title: Freezed!
customer_reviews.text: My Akaso freezed at startup and now its a piece of junk!. I only used it around 3 times, its still new and no water got inside it nor had been fallen or damaged by any means. It was a big disappointment for me as I was expected it to be a replacement for GoPro The photo quality and videos and other features are quite good for the money and might be the best among all sports cameras " of the same size" except the GoPro which is far beyond comparison. My advise, Buy the real thing. regards
customer_reviews.author: MZN

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressive video quality, no loop rec
customer_reviews.text: First impression is that video footage quality isn't that great (especially the 1080). I hate not having any visual reference on the Front (blinking light or something) to know if its recording or not. I also hate the .mov file format I wish it was mp4 instead. Also i couldn't get H.265 to work, no video shows up only audio on my computer and video editors. SO far i wouldn't recommend. Also no loop recording, it can split your videos in like 3,5, 10 min or unlimited recording but it's not like the loop recording on gopros.
customer_reviews.author: Salado

customer_reviews.title: My 70 year old mother and 38 year old sister can use it.
customer_reviews.text: Anybody can use this, it is touch screen or if that is too much, hold the button on the right until it turns on and then press the button on the left to start recording. It is compatible with a lot of gopro accessories so you can do anything with it. My sister also didn't drop this after a close encounter with a great white shark in 400ft water. Stabilization is great, it was used during very strong currents while being shoved up against various metal cages. It comes with two batteries that didn't fail at any inopportune time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Finn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement received
customer_reviews.text: My first v50 pro had a couple issues the company reached out to me and sent me a new v50 pro and I love it it works great my screen is now perfectly clear of any bubbles remote works great I already had the recc. Card I reformatted it as is req and I’ve tried everything on my cam and it works beautifully I’m very pleased. I now have 2 but the 2nd one is everything. Such great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Uniqone

customer_reviews.title: Camera worked very well under water; great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked very well under water -- including the Pacific Ocean off the coast of Costa Rica. It shot some very nice videos that enchanted friends and family, which delighted everyone. The only (short-term) problem was that the latch for the waterproof case broke. But after contacting Akaso about the waterproof case, they sent a new one right away, which was great -- and that is the truth!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Lil

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is great. I have never had a GoPro so I can't compare the quality with that but it works so well. I was a bit nervous about buying an off brand camera. It seemed too good to be true. I took it to Hurricane Harbor during the summer and this little camera did not disappoint. It was able to capture everything beautifully and clearly. I was scared that water might leak into the case while it was underwater but the case is so well made, nothing leaked in. It was a great buy! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ygarci15

customer_reviews.title: Good value for action cam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take videos of my bike rides. The handlebar attachment was a little small for my 31mm handlebar, but I was able to make it work. The videos are good though I need to adjust the white balance a bit. The image is clear and in focus and I especially like the ability to change the picture width. I looked at several action cam reviews and this seems to have several features missing in others. The quality seems good. Overall the Akaso V50 Pro seems to be a a good value.
customer_reviews.author: James from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and works great!
customer_reviews.text: My first impressions of this sports camera is very good. In comparison to a less expensive model, it is well worth spending a little bit more to get camera which performs very good and has A lot better features. I like the camera mount on the bottom of the camera. The microphone and speaker are much better. The software for controlling the camera from your cell phone works very well. The batteries seem to be better, and the battery door is much easier to open. I would recommend this camera and look forward to using it while fishing and snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: New Tooth

customer_reviews.title: Best Value in Action Cameras - Picture and Video Quality A+
customer_reviews.text: I researched GOPRO, AKASO, and other brands; this product is clearly the best value. I like the picture quality, video quality, and accessories. I did purchase a few more accessories that didn't come with the camera's package, but that only cost less than $20. And the AKASO technical support has been VERY responsive to my needs, as one battery needed to be replaced (defective). Overall, I am VERY happy with this purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stewcruiser

customer_reviews.title: AKASO V50 Pro is a great action camera!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheap action camera with more features, then you should buy AKASO V50 Pro! This camera compact and a solid design. The touch screen is amazing and bright. Easy functionality and quick start up. I was very pleased with the microphone and sound. Haven’t tested underwater or in extreme conditions yet, and I will update once I do. But out of the box, the Akaso V50 Pro seems to be the best bang for your buck. Also the battery life is more than I expected. I definitely recommend this camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike for GA

customer_reviews.title: Good but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a decent camera for the price. I haven't had a lot of use, but have tested the various features. The only thing I can't get to work properly is the fast motion recording at 10 or 15X speed. I've tried multiple SD cards and it will still freeze. Been working with their customer support troubleshooting, but have yet to get a proper resolution. Not sure if I'm going to keep it or refund at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid camera - case is faulty
customer_reviews.text: Got a case as part of a kit with a camera on Amazon. Opening the case the first time went smooth and easy but closing it broke the latch laterally before even pushing down on the latch to secure the camera. Not acceptable. Must be a manufacturing or material design flaw - this is a well documented issue. Not happy. Raises serious concerns when using underwater. Otherwise, camera is very competitive to GoPro 5 and Yi 4K.
customer_reviews.author: me!

customer_reviews.title: Takes nice videos or snap shots.
customer_reviews.text: The camera surprised me with the quality of the videos that I have done. It is not real good in dim light conditions but still does a fair job. I took videos of deer early in the AM and they were a little dark but OK. The camera is easy to operate and it is simple without a lot of complicated settings once you set it up originally though there are things you can change in setting if you want to. The stabilization works very well. Over all, for a lower cost action camera, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an action camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this little camera. It's video quality in daylight is very good considering the low price. It struggles a bit in low light but that's not a concern for me as I use it mostly to record bike trips and outdoor pickleball tournaments with friends. The screen on the back is a real plus compared to my older GoPro which you generally had to guess what you're aiming at. Overall a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: S Rock

customer_reviews.title: A very nice option for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying that this is my first action camera, part of the reason why the budget price and features of the AKASO V50 Pro fit my needs. The packaging is top-notch and the included accessories make for a complete kit. The camera itself feels like quality and is pretty responsive in the Menu features. Picture quality at 1080p 30FPS is in my video, with the camera mounted inside the vehicle. For the money, I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maestroso

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level action camera.
customer_reviews.text: After viewing and watching several review videos, I purchased this action camera. I was hesitant about the purchase because of unknown brand name. I've been pleasantly surprised by this camera and it's accessories. I'm using it on my bicycle helmet and it works great. Mounting the camera near the top of your helmet (head) the weight is barely noticeable in the waterproof case (a half full can of soda). I'm still playing with the settings to get the best overall video and photos, but look forward to getting some nice videos with the camera and its accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest I didn't have a lot of faith in something in this price range but it has absolutely exceeded my expectations. The picture quality is very good for the price, and having native 4k to match with my higher end sony camera when I do my motoreviews is really really welcome. I had to replace a HDR-AS300 Sony action cam that failed due to heat melting the lens glue and I wasn't looking forward to spending another 300-400 bucks for a cam. A friend suggested this one and at 100 bucks it is a fantastic value for what you get included in the box. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: NoRegrets78

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this action camera, and all of the top reviewers said that the Akaso Pro 4K was the best one for the price. I was skeptical but ultimately I am very happy with my decision as it comes with a ridiculous amount of accessories, 2 batteries, a recharging dock, and a waterproof case. If you're interested, I'd high recommend checking out the reviews on youtube, specifically by "Red Skull". Note that you do need to buy a separate SD card before using this camera. Most people get the 128 gb Samsung one that's popular on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Safwan M.

customer_reviews.title: not amazing but not terrible either... worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vaca, it took a while to realize you HAVE to have the image stabilization on especially in low light. during the day on a sunny hot beach the picture is perfect but over cart or night time really is not the best. Easy to use and great little product for the price. overall if you are not too bother to have a perfect quality video and just looking for something to capture a fun vaca I would say go for it
customer_reviews.author: Ren R

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang For your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a waterproof camera for my upcoming trip to Thailand. I wasn't looking to spend 100s of dollars on a traditional GoPro. This camera is comparable to the newest GoPro out there. I used this camera throughout my trip and I was so happy with the picture quality. The pictures and videos that came out of this trip will be cherished for life. I would highly recommend this camera if you are looking for a cheap but highly comparable camera to a GoPro. Overall the quality is very good and I even bought the accessories package for the Akaso camera. Totally worth it they are so useful in so many great pictures and videos were taken as a result!
customer_reviews.author: Devir

customer_reviews.title: Great price with quality all around, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband to use with his new motorcycle. Thought about buying a Go Pro, but the price is too high. Researched this product and compared with others before purchase. This camera turned out to be the perfect fit for his needs with a much lower price tag. Have no complaints. Battery life is a good 4-5 hours. Stabilization is really good. Video playback has a great picture when he downloads to the computer. He has also posted a couple of Youtube videos with decent quality. Works well with accessory kits on Amazon also.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nook

customer_reviews.title: Great Little outdoor camera.
customer_reviews.text: Only a few things I had a problem with: 1. The instructions are a little confusing but after a little review I figured them out. 2. The picture could be better using the zoom mode. But for the price, you get a very handy little camera for hunting and outdoor activities. I would recommend this little gem to anyone looking to get your action on camera.
customer_reviews.author: DavPa1995

customer_reviews.title: First impressions- Good quality video, lots of accessories, affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this camera very long, but have been testing it out some. Video clips look great with the image stabilization on. The stabilization really helps to keep the image from looking shaky. The camera also came with a lot of useful accessories. Touchscreen works good and is easy to use. I also found that it's easy to download the video and picture files from the camera to my laptop via the USB cable provided. I plan to use this camera primarily on my motorcycle and when visiting national parks and the beach.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMullen

customer_reviews.title: wireless feature is a must
customer_reviews.text: The AKASO V50 is great, I got it as a Christmas gift this Christmas and Ive used it as a normal action camera during actions and road trips. With the wireless feature Ive used the camera and the mounting attachments it comes with to mount the camera to an RC car and watch where the car goes from far away. The Camera comes with lots of mounting brackets for different attachments, some with threaded studs and some with 3M style sticky strips that stick great. easy to use touch screen and batteries that charge fast and last a decent amount of time. Overall a great action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good video and still quality
customer_reviews.text: Really can't complain about the quality of the videos and stills especially for the price. The one star was taken off for the weak waterproof housing. The design and material are subpar. The black clip will break sooner than later. Update: 1. The seller sent me two more waterproof housing. Both cracked the same way at the black clip. The plastic is just too weak. 2. This camera can be turned into a very good webcam. Change the USB mode in SETUP. Connect the USB cable. Windows 10 will recognize the camera.
customer_reviews.author: GagaGigi

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but buggy app
customer_reviews.text: I like how clear the picture is when using this camera, but am not happy about the battery life. The batteries just don't last as long as I was hoping, making it challenging when using it out and about. I bought this primarily for a trip to Hawaii and wanted to get some in water and underwater footage. Overall the quality is acceptable, especially considering the relatively low price compared to similar spec GoPros.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Its like a GoPro, just affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Very very comparable to the GoPro I purchased and returned (due to high cost) back in spring of this year. The camera, accessories kit, AND 128gb SD card for this camera was about 1/3 the cost of just the GoPro I returned, and this Akaso V50 Pro comes with a really nifty wearable remote control watch and more accessories (in package) than the GoPro came with in its package. Quality made. Affordable price. No buyers regret for this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a good price. Akaso Customer Service is top notch.
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the first camera I received. Failed pretty quickly and I didn't have a chance to use it. *** UPDATE *** Akaso CS has contacted me to provide a replacement at no cost. I can vouch for their customer service having interest in resolving the situation, since I have seen similar comments on 1 star reviews here. *** UPDATE #2 *** Received my replacement and the camera is working as expected. Haven't been able to fully test it, but everything is working properly so far. Bumping my review to 4.5 stars since Akaso Customer Support was great, and the camera seems to be doing everything I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: L. Quiros

customer_reviews.title: High quality, amazing water proofing!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera has surpassed my expectations! The battery life is great when only doing photos. But if your doing constant videos the battery will die kinda quickly. The video quality is amazing though!! Pictures are also pretty good a couple came out pixelated but I think I had it in diving mode above water. I love the touch screen, it’s simple to navigate! Today we went diving at the beach and this held up perfectly! We are doing a birthday dive at a spring this weekend and look forward to using this! I highly recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Inspired Reviews!

customer_reviews.title: Great little action camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to review this camera until I have had time to run it through its paces. I have to say I am VERY happy with my purchase!!! I mostly use this in my race car at 1080P/60fps and it works very good! Image stabilization is great. I tried 4K/30fps in the race car and it is a little choppy. I also took this camera to Niagara Falls to take both video and stills and I was very impressed! I definitely am glad I did the research and bought this camera!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It’s true... you get what you pay for... JUNK!!
customer_reviews.text: I race and have been wanting a go-pro. My fiancé found this and it had great reviews so She decided to give it a try and buy it for Christmas. Today was my 1st day at the track; with 2 fully charged batteries. The 1st battery died within 26 recorded seconds. The 2nd battery went from 100% to 75% the minute I hit record, and died while shut off. Needless to say, she wasted money on this crappy knockoff. I would give this product ZERO stars because it didn’t do anything, but that’s not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Dparksjr

customer_reviews.title: Great action camera for the Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality materials, the touch screen even though small is very accurate and high resolution quality, the interface is very very good for the small size ! the accessories are very good the video quality in 4k is ok with good light but a bit noise with low light, the setting "RIDING mode" and the wind noise reduction is great when you ride motorcycle !!!! the audio input level is very useful to avoid noise and saturation, the photo quality could be better. highly recommended for the price!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PABLO

customer_reviews.title: Revision of review:  service is getting much improved
customer_reviews.text: Revision: customer service is replacing the waterproof case at no additional charge. Provided it is satisfactory, my review will indicate a 5-star award. Very first impression upon unboxing is that the waterproof case lens is scratched pretty badly. It has the protective coating on it but when I removed the film, it was scratched. It looks as if it was used. Let’s see who cares and answered my review to see if it gets more stars. I will update after this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for motovlogging. Very good video and sound. Some of the reviews here are being extremely critical. The Akaso mic that you have to buy if you want to use an external mic is only 10 dollars. Works great for me with mic setting at 60%. Worth the money for sure. Dont forget to buy a micro sd card though. Already very impressed. Got it to mount on my helmet with the included mounts. Probably an easier way with extras but I did with what I had. Great so far! I never have had a gopro so I was surprised by how small it is. Small but packs a punch for sure. 4k image stabilization under $200 is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great GoPro competitor!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give the Akaso V50 Pro a chance after doing some research for alternatives to GoPro cameras. I am impressed! The video and picture quality are excellent and the accessories included are more than enough to get you started. I cannot download 4k videos from the camera to my phone using their app but it works fine when it is set to 1080p. Not sure if that is a phone or app issue. For the price you will not be disappointed so give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update: awesome customer service! Took care of my concerns and resolved my issue. The video quality at “4K” was very similar to my early 2000s hi-8 camcorder. I was using the Samsung high speed card that is recommended on Amazon, but the Akaso tech support thought it might be the issue. I tried another card with the same result. I had high hopes based on all the good reviews, but I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Cash32

customer_reviews.title: probably not objective
customer_reviews.text: The application is used to perform operations with the camera has bad reviews on play market. the remote control sometimes work sometimes doesn't. the quality of this remote control is poor and made from cheap plastic. wifi turns itself and block the work of device. The item doesn't have clear instructions. The item has a lot of accessories out the box. The item returned after 30 minutes of using. Thank Amazon for ability to return this item. i would say the product tries to be better, but it needs some work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: At this price point you won't find a comparable product. It punches way above it's weight, is it $3-400.00 GoPro? Of course not, but it isn't too far off in the 4k image quality. The 1080P isn't too swift, it's not bad, just not very good as most aren't in these cheaper Chinese camera's. I have a Hero3 and this camera exceeds it image wise
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: AKASO V50 Pro Native 4K30fps 20MP WiFi Action Camera with EIS Touch Screen 100 feet Waterproof Camera Web Camera Support External Mic Remote Control Sports Camera with Helmet Accessories Kit
feature_bullets: SUPERB IMAGE QUALITY: Featuring 4K/30fps and 20MP image, your AKASO V50 Pro action camera can capture every detail of your wonderful outdoor adventures and present an immersive footage of you and your world.

ELECTRONIC IMAGE STABILIZATION: Built-in Electronic Image Stabilization (EIS) with 6-axis gyroscope detects position and motion changes. When the camera tilts, moves, shakes or experiences impact, this action camera can still produce stable videos.

OPTIONAL VIEW ANGLE: You can adjust the view angle of this action camera according to your needs between Super Wide, Wide, Medium and Narrow. This action camera also has the distortion calibration feature, which offers image distortion improvements.

BUILT-IN WIFI AND HDMI OUTPUT: Just download App(AKASO GO) on your phone or tablet and connect it to this action camera, you can share your wonderful moment on social media instantly. With HDMI Port allows you to connect it to TV.

FREE VALUABLE ACCESSORIES: This underwater camera comes with 2 rechargeable 1100mAh batteries, chargers and remote control wristband and lots of accessories kits. The kits fit most cameras even Gopro.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,806 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
